original_text: On the ninth day of the fourth month the famine was so severe in the city that there was no food for the people of the land.
korean_text: 그 해 넷째 달 구일에 성중에 기근이 심하여 그 땅 백성의 양식이 떨어졌더라

sentences.original_text: On the ninth day of the fourth month
the famine was so severe in the city
that there was no food for the people of the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅 백성에게는 먹을 것이 없었습니다.
